name: The Growth Of The Ghosts
description:
Commands have come from the big boss, you must raise an army of ghosts.

You have to collect food that the ghosts want to return to this world, but if you bring them something they don't want, they will punish you for it.

Each ghost needs 3 food in order to rise, if at least one piece of food is not correct, the ghost will not rise and you will lose one health point. If the ghost has risen, you get extra time.

The game will end when time or health is gone.

WASD - for movement.

p.s. I did not have enough time for optimization, and for a lot more.
